title: Social services worker verification (home visits)
dataVerified: Worker name, photo, agency ID, department, supervisor contact
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Worker status (active/verified). Real-time verification shows worker photo, agency ID, department affiliation, supervisor contact. Link to government social services department system
rationale: Family verifies social services worker, child protective services worker, welfare officer credentials before admitting to home. Domain binding verifies government social services department (social-services.gov, child-services.gov). Prevents fake social worker scams (criminals impersonating social workers to gain property access, kidnapping attempts). Critical child safety, family protection. Enhances accountability for legitimate social workers.
